Hi!

My Name is Mitchell Hillman and I am a graphic designer, sometimes illustrator, and programmer. I work with Journey Group.

As a designer I strive to create marketing media that speaks the clearest possible message with the least ammount of design. In pursuit of this goal I seek ways to combine minimal graphic design with a common-sense use of technology.

Also, I believe that succeeding at design requires a firm grasp of production technique. For that reason I am fascinated with the practices of my trade. Being able to build what I concieve is very important to me. Currently I am working a lot with jQuery, SASS, Adobe CC, and Drupal, but I am learning about exciting new tools all the time.

If you would like my help on one of your projects, please feel free reach out through one of my social networks.

  • Dribbble
  • Twitter
  • Linkedin
  • Github
  • Behance
